Hey！I should be asking this in Pluto, but I already did, and no one replied... so I think its worth asking here once！The devs here have some experience with Pluto too, I think！
 
In YaoPlots, when the circuit diagram is long in width, we have a scroll bar to view the entire circuit.
Can I achieve this "scroll bar" with an image too(png or svg or any other format)？

text:
The slider in plots is actually a scroll bar.
While the slider in Pluto is a
`html"input type='range'>"`
So I am not sure if you need that slider to scroll along the width of the image horizontally.

IMO it(the browser) should automatically detect that the image is wide and needs a scroll bar or this might need some tweaking in Pluto's frontend stuff.
